mod.name: ESPN 94-95 Tv Overlay
mod.shortdescription: Add an ESPN 95 Overlay + FOXTrax shot speed + Change the Jumbotron's videos based on situations + Loads team based reflections for helmets and spots
mod.creator: Jedeash

mod.name: Animated Upper Ad Engine
mod.shortdescription: A modular animated upper ad engine
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Animated Upper Crowd
mod.shortdescription: Adds a basic animated effect to the upper crowd sprites
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Automatic Font Loader
mod.shortdescription: Automatically loads all fonts from launcher/media/fonts/
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Automatic Texture Injector
mod.shortdescription: Automatically injects all texture from launcher/media/textures/inject/
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: CerebralPolicy's Immersive Game Clocks Master
mod.shortdescription: The master file for CerebralPolicy's gameclocks, any shared assets will be housed in this mod.
mod.creator: Update: CerebralPolicy, Original: Lepiney, Jedeash, Vod

mod.name: Cutscene FOV
mod.shortdescription: Randomly set the FOV for cutscenes. You can set the minimum and maximum FOV in the options.
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Improved Ditty Engine
mod.shortdescription: A new ditty engine with support for MP3 files, reverb and new events
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Dynasty Arena Lite HD Textures
mod.shortdescription: Injects HD textures for Dynasty's Arena Lite
mod.creator: Ciais

mod.name: Extended Timer Settings
mod.shortdescription: Adds more settings for customizing the game timer
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Improved Fights
mod.shortdescription: This mod adds some new fight settings to the game
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: FOV Modifier hotkey
mod.shortdescription: Allows you to change the FOV modifier in-game using the 'Page Up' and 'Page Down' keys.
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Framerate
mod.shortdescription: Measures and displays the framerate
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Game Logging
mod.shortdescription: Log gameplay events to "Game Log.txt"
mod.creator: Vod,drgullen

mod.name: Goal Replays
mod.shortdescription: Allows you to configure the number of times to display goal replays
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Improved Goalie Cover
mod.shortdescription: This mod attempts to improve the goalie cover logic
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: 2020 HNIC Clock with Animated Goal Notification
mod.shortdescription: A Hockey Night in Canada goal clock with a modern goal animation.
mod.creator: Update: CerebralPolicy, Original: Lepiney, Jedeash, Vod

mod.name: In Game Tweaks
mod.shortdescription: This mod enables access to change various aspects of game play
mod.creator: drgullen

mod.name: Jumbotron Video Example
mod.shortdescription: This is a demonstration of the video texture library. Select Toronto as the home team and press the "I" key while in replay mode
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Default Libraries
mod.shortdescription: Default launcher libraries
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: NHL Upper Ad Module
mod.shortdescription: Animated upper ads for NHL teams. This is an addon for Vod's Animated Upper Ad mod.
mod.creator: Franco Duck

mod.name: Pyeongchang Video Jumbotron
mod.shortdescription: Adapt the jumbotron video for home team
mod.creator: LJedeash

mod.name: Points
mod.shortdescription: Set the game mode points within the launcher GUI
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Reload Assets
mod.shortdescription: Reload all assets, including scripts using CTRL + ALT + R.
mod.description: This releases all assets and scripts and then reloads all scripts and executes the global scope. After all scripts have been loaded, it calls the "Reloaded" callback. This is where you can reload everything. It's best practice to have a single function that loads all assets that is called by both the "DeviceCreated" callback and "Reloaded" callback.
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: 2020 RSN Clock with Animated Goal Notification
mod.shortdescription: A Rogers Sportsnet goal clock with a modern goal animation.
mod.creator: Update: CerebralPolicy, Original: Lepiney, Jedeash, Vod

mod.name: Screenshots
mod.shortdescription: Faster screenshot method with jpg support
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: Shot Speed
mod.shortdescription: Displays a shot speed indicator
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: StatClock
mod.shortdescription: An in-game clock that shows various stats throughout the game.
mod.creator: drgullen

mod.name: Default System Scripts
mod.shortdescription: Default launcher system scripts
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: True Broadcast Camera
mod.shortdescription: Replaces the broadcast camera with a more realistic camera
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: TSN Clock
mod.shortdescription: A basic gameclock that demonstrates some of the launcher's library and drawing functions
mod.creator: Lepiney, Jedeash, Vod

mod.name: Tweaks
mod.shortdescription: Allows you to edit various hidden variables within the Launcher GUI
mod.creator: Vod

mod.name: XInput
mod.shortdescription: Adds support for XInput controllers (such as XBox 360), including trigger mapping, battery information and rumble
mod.creator: Vod
